required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Firm Observational Clinical Unicenter Study on Guillain Barré Syndrome
clinical_study.official_title: Firm Observational Clinical Unicenter Study on Guillain Barré Syndrome (FOCUS on GBS)

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this retrospective observational single-center cohort study is to gain a deeper understanding regarding the frequency, the clinical and electrophysiologic characteristics (e.g., the diagnostic work up), complications, treatment regimes, and their associations with specific courses of disease and outcomes in adult patients with the suspected or proven diagnosis of GBS.

detailed_description.textblock: Guillain Barré Syndrome (GBS) is a rare and life-threatening neurological emergency. The aim of this retrospective study including adult GBS patients from the last 15 years treated at the University Hospital of Basel is to assess data regarding diagnostic workup, treatment, clinical course including complications and outcomes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: frequency of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: clinical characteristics of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: electrophysiologic characteristics of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: complications of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: treatment regimes of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

primary_outcome.time_frame: one time retrospective assessment at baseline
primary_outcome.description: treatment regimes of GBS of all consecutive adult patients with the suspected initial diagnosis of GBS (admitted to the University Hospital Basel)

intervention.description: Retrospective extraction of demographic, clinical, laboratory, and electrophysiological data from the digital medical records

study_pop.textblock: patients with the suspected and with the final proven diagnosis of GBS in the years 2005-2021

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- suspected diagnosis of GBS, who have been treated at the University Hospital of Basel from 01.01.2005-28.02.2021
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with documented refusal of the general consent.

overall_official.affiliation: Clinic for Intensive Care Medicine, University Hospital Basel

facility.name: Clinic for Intensive Care Medicine; University Hospital Basel
